title: Mentioned as unlimited drive storage but got only 15GB.
content:
Before buying my pixel 3A they told me that it have unlimited storage in Drive. But i git only 15Gb like other android users.
If they made atleast to 25Gb means i will happy with that because this is really more than other brands, but they provide the same like others,. Then why mentioned with a word unlimited? Do you know the meaning for unlimited??
